name: Hostal Mamut

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for just one night when breaking up a long bus journey to Argentina. We got PR'd at the bus station and the dorms here were the cheapest, so we went to check it out.
reviews.title: Great place to chill

reviews.text: The dorm we stayed in had only 4 beds and was actually really comfortable. 5000 chilean for a dorm, which was by far the cheapest in San Pedro.
reviews.title: So friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hostel has a little kitchen perfect for cooking. Salt and sugar provided too. It can get a bit busy if everyone wants to cook at the same time, but thats pretty normal.
reviews.title: Different with nice communal area but v.basic

aka: Hostal Mamut Atacama/San Pedro De Atacama, Chile
